title: Alliance of Galactic Travellers Banner
summary: Alliance of Galactic Travellers Banner is a customisation part available from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion.
game_description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in support of nomadic and exploratory space travel.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 220 Quicksilver.
release_history: * NextGen - Added as a customisation part.

title: Amino Hub Banner
summary: Amino Hub Banner is a customisation part available from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion.
game_description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in support of community, adventure and discovery.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 220 Quicksilver.
release_history: * NextGen - Added as a customisation part.

title: Ancient Data Structure
summary:
Ancient Data Structure is a type of 35px icon. It contains one of the following:
* Navigation Data
* Drop Pod Coordinate Data
release_history: * NEXT - Added to the game.
additional_info:
*The largest discovered data cluster had 35 pedestals. It was found on the planet 35 in the Shisteeni system.
*Vortex Cube used the same kind of pedestal prior to the NEXT update.

title: Appalling Banner
summary: Appalling Banner is a customisation part available from the Scrap Dealer.
game_description:
Demonstrate your interest in the macabre and the horrific with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Scrap Dealer for 220 Tainted Metal.
release_history: * Origins - Added as a customisation part.

title: Armoured Suit
summary: Armoured Suit is a collection of armoured pieces that when combined will create a complete armoured suit. It has been described as the "practical fashion choice favoured by the Vy'keen".
game_description:
{| class="wikitable"
!Image || Cost || Description
|-
|200px || 1000
source_info: Each piece can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for the indicated amount of Quicksilver
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a series of customisation parts.
* Visions - Removed from Quicksilver shop
* Beyond - Added back in.

title: Café 42 Banner
summary: Café 42 Banner is a customisation part available from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion.
game_description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in the spirit of friends, fun and good vibes.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 220 Quicksilver.
release_history: * NextGen - Added as a customisation part.

title: Carrier AI Fragment
summary: Carrier AI Fragment is a component. It is specifically used to detect crashed Sentinel Interceptors. It is very useful if you want to gain a Sentinel Interceptor.
game_description:
A single splinter of the colossal mainframe at the heart of a Sentinel capital ship. It blinks, its solitary living eye trained upon the one piece of data it retains - the last known location of one of its fleet of Interceptors.

Select the AI Fragment and use Search Archive (E) to translate information about Interceptor's crash site to your starship's navigation systems.
source_info:
*Dropped from Nexus missions (1-2%)
*Gained occasionally from successful combat frigate expeditions (2.7%)
release_history:
* Interceptor - Added as a component
* Echoes - Renamed, was "Dreadnought AI Fragment"

title: Core to Core Jump
summary: The Core to Core Jump technique consists in transitioning to the next galaxy via its centre and landing directly in the next galaxy core area. This is achieved by passing through a Black Hole in the core area of the starting galaxy, immediately reaching a Gateway system and then warping to the Galaxy Centre as usual. The spawning point coordinates in the next galaxy will be exactly the same as the black hole exit coordinates.

title: Deflector Shield (Atlas)
summary: Deflector shields are the standard means of protecting a quick menu, but at this time, only raw materials appear - no shielding shards, etc.
game_description:
Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.
User is advised that Oxide elements are required to recharge device.
Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.

infobox.desc: Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.

title: Detoxified Slime
summary: Detoxified Slime is a customisation part available from the Scrap Dealer.
game_description:
Gelatinous and slowly pulsing, this puddle of living slime smells sweeter than would be imagined.

Though there is no evidence to suggest it would be unsafe to do so, avoid treading on the slime where possible.
release_history: * Origins - Added as a customisation part.

title: Di-hydrogen Jelly
summary: Di-hydrogen Jelly is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A faintly-glowing jelly. Its gentle light and soft wobble belie the fact that this sticky gel is both highly toxic and highly flammable. Skin contact is to be avoided at all costs.

Synthesised from Di-hydrogen.
source_info: Available from some
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product.
* Fractal - Exploit nerfed.
additional_info:
* It is required to repair the starship's Launch Thruster.
* Exploit - If you have a refiner, you can exploit di-hydrogen by refining Di-hydrogen Jelly from 30 di-hydrogen and then refining it back into 40 di-hydrogen.

title: Frameshift Catapult
summary:
The Frameshift Catapult is an alternative hyperdrive technology first introduced in Expedition 3: Cartographers.

It is a special alternative Hyperdrive on the player's starting starship. During the Expedition, it needs to be repaired shortly after the player leaves the starting planet.

Once repaired, it can be recharged with Warp Cells or a Warp Hypercore.
game_description:
This experimental drive augments conventional hyperdrive technology by distorting local geometry at the point of warp initialisation, boosting range and efficiency far beyond standard drives.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through the Galactic Map.
release_history: *Expeditions - Expedition 3: Cartographers: Added as a special technology.
additional_info: As stated in the game description, this hyperdrive is superior to the more conventional hyperdrive. If one would use a save editing tool to replace the standard hyperdrive module on a starship with a Frameshift outside of Expedition 3, the hyperdrive capabilities would be considerabily improved over the original drive. Experiments have shown that the author's Fighter-Class ship was able to reach Hyperdrive ranges of well over 2,000 lightyears using the Frameshift and six X-class hyperdrive upgrades at 300 ly each, surpassing many other fighters ly ranges in the process.

infobox.desc: FTL propulsion drive for warp speed

title: Grafted Eyes
summary: Grafted Eyes is one of the primary Living starship weapons, and is an alternative to the more common Spewing Vents. Both can be used to mine asteroids in space, which hold valuable resources.
game_description: A complex array of membranes and lens, fused atop a high-energy laser array. Incineration awaits those that meet their stare.
release_history:
* Living Ship - Added as a weapon.
* Update 2.32 - Added an ability to evolve for
additional_info: *Upgrade Nodes can be obtained by shooting Void Eggs in uncharted and abandoned systems.

title: Grenade technology
summary: Grenade technology is technology that upgrades a player's Plasma Launcher.

title: Harmonic Brain
summary: Harmonic Brain is a component that is used for upgrading.
game_description:
The central processing unit of a Sentinel interceptor ship. The circuitry appears stable, pulsing with a regular electrical heartbeat. It no longer reacts angrily to my presence.

Status: DOCILE

Install this unit in a disabled Sentinel ship to unlock its vestigial cockpit and enable manual piloting.
source_info: * Received by presenting a Hyaline Brain to a Monolith
use_info: Harmonic Brain is used in the repair of Sentinel Interceptors.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a component.

title: Harvested Agricultural Substance
summary: Harvested Agricultural Substance is a type of resource, grouped under the flora division.
source_info:
* Can be harvested in the wild. Most require farmed.
* Before they can be farmed, the assistance of the Farmer is needed.
use_info: * Crafted into Refined into other Cooked into Raw Ingredients, Edible Products, or Creature Pellets.
release_history: Foundations - Introduced as a resource type.
additional_info:
* Cactus Flesh and Kelp Sac don't require the Haz-Mat Gauntlet to harvest.
* All the farmable members of this item type are used in the making of valuable trade items such as Living Glass, Liquid Explosive and Circuit Board.

title: Hazard Protection Unit
summary: Hazard Protection Units are extensions for the players' Oxide or with Shielding Products such as Shielding Shard, Shielding Sheet and Shielding Plate.

title: Horrific Flesh-Helmet
summary: Horrific Flesh-Helmet is an unlockable helmet available via the Appearance Modifier.
game_description:
Naturally transform your appearance via the application of a flesh-hungry parasite. This living being partially fuses with the brainstem of its host, sealing their symbiosis.

Cautiously transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Scrap Dealer for 3200 Tainted Metal.
release_history: * Origins - Added as a customisation part.
additional_info: This face transformation resembles the fauna seen in derelict freighters.

title: Hyaline Brain
summary:
Hyaline Brain is a component which, when purified into a Harmonic Brain at a Monolith, is used to make a crashed Sentinel Interceptor claimable.
When the player has 3 Radiant Shard and 1 Inverted Mirror (collected from a Dissonance Resonator) in their inventory the Hyaline Brain can be probed in the inventory (by pressing E on PC) revealing the location of the closest Monolith.
game_description:
The central processing unit of a Sentinel interceptor ship. The circuitry writhes microscopically, constantly rearranging itself as it scans for anomalies.

A vital component for any entity wishing to construct their own Pilot Interface for a Sentinel Interceptor.

Status: VOLATILE
source_info:
* Loot from crashed Sentinel Interceptors (100%).
* Loot from destroying enemy sentinel interceptors in space (15%)
use_info: Hyaline Brain is used in the repair of Sentinel Interceptors.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a component.
additional_info: Hyaline Brain can be transformed into a Harmonic Brain at a Monolith.

title: Inverted Mirror
summary: Inverted Mirror is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A pane of watchful g l a s s, retrieved from the smoking remains of the corrupted swarm's Dissonance Resonators. It emits more light than it reflects, casting a faint purple hue on its surroundings.

Highly sought after for salvage operations, as it can be used to bypass the security systems of key Sentinel ship technologies.
source_info:
* Loot from a Dissonance Resonator with the Inverted Mirror tag.
* May also be found on Harmonic Scrap.
use_info: Inverted Mirror is used in the repair of Sentinel multi-tools and crashed Interceptors.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a component.
additional_info: When a Dissonance Resonator is destroyed, it will drop either an Inverted Mirror or an Echo Locator. Which it will drop is indicated by a tag below its name on the HUD when you are close to it.

title: Iteration: Ares Visage
summary: Iteration: Ares Visage is an unlockable helmet available via the Appearance Modifier.
game_description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

This part silicone, part biological helmet can detect and replicate the facial muscle movements of the wearer, creating the appearance of a natural head. It is fully compatible with exosuit technology and provides all protection of a traditional helmet.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 3200
release_history: * Beyond - Added as a customisation part.
additional_info: This visage simulates the features of Iteration: Ares, an "avid collector of exotic goods" on the Space Anomaly.

summary: Iteration: Ariadne Visage is an unlockable helmet available via the Appearance Modifier.

title: Launch Thruster
summary:
Launch Thruster is a class="article-table" style="text-align: center" |- ! rowspan="2" | [[Starship#Starship Archetypes|Starship
archetypes !! colspan="4" | - ! Creative !! Normal !! Survival !! Permadeath |- |[[Starship#Exotic - High .26 Balanced Stats|Exotic|| 0 % || 25 % || 50 % || 50 % |- |Explorer|| 0 % || 12.5 % || 25 % || 25 % |- |Fighter|| 0 % || 25 % || 50 % || 50 % |- |Hauler|| 0 % || 25 % || 50 % || 50 % |- |Shuttle|| 0 % || 16.6 % || 33.3 % || 33.3 % |} If Launch Thrusters is damaged by rough handling or enemy fire, the starship will be unable to lift-off until it is repaired.
game_description:
Vital launch and landing gear system.

User is advised that specialised, Deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.

Hold [W] to take off from planet.

Hold [Circle/Shift/B] to initiate in-flight speed boost.
additional_info:
*Summoning a starship via the Quick Menu deducts one launch's worth of fuel regardless of its previous location. If there is less than one launch's worth of thruster fuel in that starship, the player will not be able to summon it in this manner until it is refueled.
*Launch Thruster can be refueled remotely if the starship's inventory contains the required fuel items.

**If Efficient Thrusters is installed adjacent to Launch Thrusters, an Upgrade bonus triggers which indirectly affects Launch Thrusters. However Efficient Thrusters doesn't get a bonus in this circumstance as the -20% boost fuel cost is a flat rate reduction. This is the case for survival and perma death modes at least and is unknown if this is intended or error.
*If Launch Thrusters are installed in a supercharged slot, the fuel cost to lift-off is increased.

infobox.desc: Used during initial takeoff and landings

title: Life Support
summary:
Provides general life support as part of the general exosuit functionality. The level of current support is displayed on one of the various HUD bars, marked with the same "heartbeat" symbol as is displayed on the suit icon.

Unlike movement outside of an Dead planet.
game_description:
The core of the Exosuit, the Life Support System continually filters and pumps breathable Oxygen.

In addition to its role in the continued existence of the Exosuit user, the Life Support Unit uses surplus oxygen to generate power for secondary systems, such as the Jetpack, Speed Augmentation and Torch.

Charge equipment with Oxygen, Life Support Gel or Dioxite.
additional_info:
*Upgrade bonuses trigger if Life Support is adjacent to Oxygen Recycler or Life Support Upgrades, though this only indirectly augments Life Support by improving the effects of its upgrades.
*Despite being impossible to Craft, a placeholder Blueprint exists within the Space Anomaly, with a suggested build cost of 100 Ferrite Dust.
*For some odd reason, in the event of Life Support being damaged (ex. Galactic Travel), the power gauge never drains and always stays at the same percentage until it is repaired (ongoing bug).

infobox.desc: Provides basic life support from environmental hazards.

title: Neural Assembly
summary:
Neural Assembly is a Living starship technology that is required for the starship's landing and lift-off.

Neural Assembly consumes fuel each time the starship launched from the surface of a planet or moon, which must eventually be recharged using Oxygen (1%/unit) or Mordite (0.5%/unit).

There will be no fuel cost when Landing Pads or designated landing spots (indicated in flight by concentric blue rings which turn green when the starship gets close enough to land on the spot) are used.

The base launch cost is 25% in Normal mode.

If Neural Assembly is damaged by rough handling or enemy fire, the starship will be unable to lift-off until it is repaired.
game_description: An array of distributed neurons, fused to a board of metallic strands. Complex patterns of electrical impulses weave their way across the surface, knotting each ship system together.
additional_info: *Summoning a starship via the Void Eggs in uncharted and abandoned systems.

infobox.desc: Used during initial takeoff and landings

title: Phase Beam (Atlas)
summary: The Phase Beam is one of the primary starship weapons, and is an alternative to the more common Photon Cannon. Both can be used to mine asteroids in space, which hold valuable resources.
game_description:
Spacefaring beam weapon and asteroid mining tool.

User is advised that Isotope elements are required to recharge device.

Press ... to activate.
additional_info: The Phase Beam was featured in various pre-release trailers for ''No Man's Sky'', including the PS4 Explore trailer (see below).

infobox.desc: One of the two primary ship weapons

title: Photon Cannon
summary: Photon Cannon is the default weapon installed on all starships, and is more commonly used than the alternative Phase Beam. This weapon may occasionally be referred to as a Starship Cannon, although Photon Cannon is the preferred usage.
game_description:
A destructive starship projectile launcher, the weapons system for choice for the interstellar trader and pirate alike.

Use () to change weapon mode. Press () to fire.
use_info: The cannon can be used both in direct combat and in clearing asteroids for traversal.
release_history:
* Release - Added as a weapon.
* Pathfinder - Ion Blast, Photon Accelerator and Photon Blast independent upgrades were replaced by Cyclotron Ballista, Infra-Knife Accelerator and Positron Ejector, respectively.
* NEXT - Nonlinear Optics and procedurally generated Photon Cannon Upgrades added, while Sigma/Tau/Theta upgrades removed. Formerly Heridium and Iron needed for repair.
additional_info:
* The Photon Cannon was frequently shown in the pre-release trailers, including the reveal and PS4 Explore trailers (see below).
* Photon Cannon is one of two starships weapons used by NPC starships (the other one being Phase Beam).

title: Pirate Transponder
summary: Pirate Transponder is a component.
game_description:
A unique ID transponder, ripped from the internal signal array of an outlaw starship.

Possesion
source_info: *Occasionally received on destroying pirate Starships.
release_history: * Orbital - Added to the game.
additional_info: It can be given to Mercenaries Guild Envoys to earn standing.

title: Product
summary:
Products are useful or valuable materials. Some of the products can be crafted in the player's inventory using blueprints and the proper ingredients. Most of the blueprints can be found in Operations Centres or Manufacturing Facilities unless noted otherwise.

See tradeable for products that cannot be crafted.
additional_info:
*A spreadsheet of Profitable Recipes that takes the products' total values into account can be found [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ShTS5u_8ckT9ivCQnMJP1v975_T_MsKLm-1cpQnrrgQ/edit?usp=sharing here].

de:Produkt
fr:Produits
it:Prodotto
es:Producto

title: Product (Atlas)
summary:
A product is a useful or valuable material. Products can be crafted in a player's inventory using blueprints and the proper resources. Most of the recipes can be found in Operations Centres or Manufacturing Facilities unless noted otherwise.

See trade commodity for items that cannot be crafted.

title: Quad Servo
summary: Quad Servo is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description: A highly sprung motor arm salvaged from inside of a Sentinel patrol unit. It occasionally twitches, as if experiencing the echo of combat.
source_info:
It can be obtained by the following methods:
* destroying the Combat Supplies containers dropped by Sentinel Quads
* Suspicious Packet (Goods) from the Scrap Dealer
* a gift from Guild Envoys of the Mercenaries Guild
release_history: * NEXT - Added as a product. It has the same icon as Non-Stick Piston.

title: Raletum Judirica
summary: Raletum Judirica is a flora found on the planet Sagayamatsuy-5 in the Tumise-Rekv system.

title: Recovered Item (COG)
summary: Recovered Item (COG) is a procedural item, specifically a Recovered Item.
game_description:
A damaged technology component, ejected from its machine and discarded by its owner.

Worthless, except as scrap. Select in the Inventory (
source_info: Can be obtained by opening a Buried Cache.
release_history: * Origins Update - Added as a procedural item.
additional_info: ID: PROC_COG

title: Recovered Item (DATA)
summary: Recovered Item (DATA) is a procedural item, specifically a Recovered Item.
source_info:
* Can be obtained by opening a Buried Cache.
* Dropped by Structurae on death.
release_history: * Origins Update - Added as a procedural item.
additional_info: ID: PROC_DATA

title: Recovered Item (LUMP)
summary: Recovered Item (LUMP) is a procedural item, specifically a Recovered Item.
game_description:
A scrap of organic matter. It is not clear if this is a lifeform in its own right, or some ejected/severed part of a larger being.

Unlikely to be desirable at a galactic exchange. Select in the Inventory (
source_info: Can be obtained by mining a Subterranean Organic Structure.
release_history: * Origins Update - Added as a procedural item.
additional_info: ID: PROC_LUMP

title: Refining Multiplication of Resources
summary:
This guide will provide instructions and steps for maximum production of resources without having to collect or farm them (where possible).

The objective is to obtain the maximum types and amounts of resources using only a Portable Refiner, Medium Refiner, Large Refiner.

Some of these recipes use two or three ingredients, so a large refiner is required in most cases, but having another one- and two-input refiner nearby will help speed up some of the simpler processes. The more refiners that are available, the better, as that allows for multiple processes to be run in parallell.

title: Singularity Cortex
summary:
The Singularity Cortex is the Living starship's faster-than-light propulsion drive to aid players travel across galaxies. By default, each warp between star systems consumes 20% of the Singularity Cortex's fuel supply. It requires 60 Chromatic Metal or 96 Living Slime to fully charge.

The base range of a Singularity Cortex is 101 light-years (ly) and the player can warp to any systems.
game_description:
A complex bio-metallic stem plugged directly into an antimatter heart. Registers high activity during interstellar jumps. It appears to delight in the complex calculations required for FTL travel.

Access long-distance navigation systems through Galactic Map. Keep the ship happy by regularly jumping between systems.
release_history:
* Living Ship - Introduced to the game.
* Update 2.32 - Added an ability to evolve for
additional_info: *Upgrade Nodes can be obtained by shooting Void Eggs in uncharted and abandoned systems.

infobox.desc: FTL propulsion drive for warp speed

title: Spewing Vents
summary:
Spewing Vents are the default weapon installed on all living starships.

{| class="wikitable"
|-
! colspan="2" | Base Specifications
|-
|Rate of Fire
|~7 shots/sec
|-
|Time to Overheat
|~8 seconds
|-
|Overheat Cooldown Time
|4 seconds
|}
game_description: A mess of sacs and sphincters, these vents generate and expel globules of plasma. When fused to the weapon systems of the ship, these are super-heated and then expelled at high-pressure.
use_info: The Spewing Vents can be used both in direct combat and in clearing asteroids for traversal.
release_history:
* Living Ship - Added as a weapon.
* Update 2.32 - Added an ability to evolve for
additional_info:
*Upgrade Nodes can be obtained by shooting Void Eggs in Space Encounters. They are more common in uncharted and abandoned systems.
*In previous versions of the game, the installation location of the weapon would affect its projectile color. If the weapon was installed in the Storage Sacs, the plasma fire was green. If it were installed in the Organ Chamber, the weapon fire was blue.

title: Tentacled Banner
summary: Tentacled Banner is a customisation part available from the Scrap Dealer.
game_description:
Express your curiosity about abyssal alien lifeforms with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Scrap Dealer for 220 Tainted Metal.
release_history: * Origins - Added as a customisation part.

title: Thermic Layer (NEXT)
summary:
Thermic Layer protection is a series of Exosuit upgrades that protects the user from cold temperatures on a planet's surface.

Heat capillaries containing liquid calidium are threaded through a user's suit, allowing a comfortable body temperature to be maintained.

At the highest level of protection, an internal central temperature governance chip controls the system, allowing for targeted relief and more efficient usage.
release_history:
* Release - The three levels were added as a technology class.
* NEXT - Removed from the game. If any of the levels are installed, they are turned into Obsolete Technology.
additional_info:
* Thermic Layer upgrades are charged by Oxide elements, and operate automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
* Defensive Energy Sources (Shielding Shard, Shielding Plate, Shielding Sheet) may also be used as an operational power source

infobox.desc: User is guarded from extreme cold damage on frozen worlds.

title: Toxin Suppressor (NEXT)
summary:
'Toxin Suppressor protection is a series of Exosuit upgrades that protects the user from from toxic liquids on a planet's surface.

Reactive compounds within the Suppressor unit remove toxic liquids that fall on the user, thereby reducing peril and choking hazards. Each upgrade increases the effectiveness of the protection.
release_history:
* Release - Added as a technology.
* NEXT - Removed from the game. If it was installed, it has turned into Obsolete Technology.
additional_info:
* Toxin Suppressor upgrades are charged by Oxide elements, and operate automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
* Defensive Energy Sources (Shielding Shard, Shielding Plate, Shielding Sheet) may also be used as an operational power source

infobox.desc: User is guarded from toxic liquids

title: United Federation of Travelers Banner
summary: United Federation of Travelers Banner is a customisation part available from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion.
game_description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in support of a united universe.  Document, aid, create, communicate.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info: It can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 220 Quicksilver.
release_history: * NextGen - Added as a customisation part.

title: Wriggling Companion
summary: Wriggling Companion is a customisation part available from the Scrap Dealer.
game_description:
The captured essence of an abyssal horror, contained for scientific and decorative use.

The bounding forcefield is of the very highest quality. The companion cannot escape. The companion will not escape. Escape.
release_history:
* Origins - Added as a customisation part.
* Expeditions - blueprint cost changed, used to be Tainted Metal
